siteMetadata.title: Stimsims
siteMetadata.description: Experimenting in data driven, open ended math games.
features: story-driven math problems. Take measurements, build and solve your own equations
discuss concepts and errors with in story based dialogues with characters

fantasy simulations - study the data to discover correlations and 
        cause-effect relationships. Just like real life problems, but simplified.
open-ended problems - discover the randomized relationships. Each new game is unique and unknown.
data-rich choices and answers are tallied into personal performance reports
upload performance reports to Google Drive as word docs
Compare against annonymous global aggregate reports
web browser based, designed for phones
siteMetadata.authorDescription: A web developer experimenting with story-driven, open ended math problems.
